title: Understanding Data Inventory
text: Data inventory is a comprehensive list of all data assets within an organization. It helps in identifying, managing, and protecting data effectively.

title: Role of Data Inventory in Governance
text: Data inventory supports data governance by providing a clear overview of data assets, which aids in compliance, security, and efficient data management.

title: Evaluating the Statement
text: Consider whether having a detailed list of data assets would help or hinder managing data effectively at scale.
